description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. full_summary:
===============

**Office Seating SA - LABS Canada Tender Notice**

**Reference Number:** WS3911116480-Doc3917392073

**Status:** Expired

**Publication Date:** March 14, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** March 29, 2023 (Deadline: 14:00 EDT)

**Amendment Number 2:**

This tender notice is subject to a modified closing time due to a change in deadline. Please refer to the notice description for further information.

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Commodity Code:** UNSPC 56000000 (Furniture and Furnishings), 56101504 (Chairs)

**Trade Agreements:** None

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Shannon Brewster (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [shannon.brewster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shannon.brewster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not Specified
* Fax: Not Specified

**Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15693994?extsite=MTU2OTM5OTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Tender Description:**

This procurement is for the provision of office seating for Laboratories Canada. Contractors are invited to submit a bid for the supply and delivery of office chairs.

**Submission Requirements:**

* All required supporting documentation must be submitted on or before March 29, 2023, at 14:00 EDT.
* Bids submitted after the deadline will be considered non-responsive.

**Additional Information:**

Please visit the notice URL for details regarding the bulletin and related documents. Questions or concerns should be directed to the contact person listed above. otics')
